content: shoulder join with a slip_stitch to 3rd and 4th space from the edge at the waist single_crochet in each chain of the strap* single_crochet across the front of the bib repeat between asterisks * for second strap join to top of bib with a slip_stitch finishing weave in all ends sew on a small snap to close the bodice optional do a surface slip_stitch in mc in the waist stitches where the bodice joins the skirt the gold bib dress shows the alternate method for the straps © dawn smith 8/31/23 3
